ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Interface CompositeForwarder

All Superinterfaces:
Forwarder
public interface CompositeForwarder
extends Forwarder

Forwarder built on the Composite design pattern. Child forwarders can be added and removed from this forwarder. A composite forwarder typically just forwards all method invocations to its children, but is free to implement some more complex behavior. For instance a composite forwarder could filter out certain events based on the passed in parameters.

Method Summary
 void addForwarder(Forwarder forwarder)
          Adds a child forwarder to this CompositeForwarder.
 void removeForwarder(Forwarder forwarder)
          Removes a child forwarder from this CompositeForwarder.
